snippet.title: The Tipping Point - Trailer
snippet.description:
The Tipping Point is an adventure side-scroller, set in the future where you play as Cass, a young Arctic researcher. The ice sheet is collapsing and you must make your way off the ice, but not without gathering and analyzing data about the ice on your way.

The Tipping Point is an educational game about tipping points in the climate, developed in collaboration with researchers.

Download it on the 22nd of February for free for PC and Mac on Steam. Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1749030/The_Tipping_Point/

https://fabulastudios.dk/the-tipping-point/
